about.details:
Founded in 1998, Net Avenue Technologies Limited, formerly known as Net Avenue Inc, offers Indian ethnic clothing and accessories through its online platforms cbazaar.com and ethnovog.com.

Net Avenue Technologies offers Lehenga, Saree, Salwar Kameez, Indo-Western Wear, Kurta Sets, Kurtis, Jewellery, Sherwani, Kurta Pyjama, Formal and Informal Suits and Accessories for women, men, teens, and kids.

The company has two online outlets:

Cbazaar.com: Cbazaar offers custom-tailored Indian clothing for women, men, teens, and kids in the United States, the United Kingdom, Canada, and other countries.

Ethnovog: Ethnovog offers affordable clothing for women, teens, and children.

The company also lists third-party products and offers customization options. The company works with international courier services such as DHL, FedEx, and Aramex to ensure timely delivery to customers.

faqs.question: What is the Net Avenue Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Net Avenue Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 5696000 equity shares of the face value of ₹1 aggregating up to ₹10.25 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹18 per share. The minimum order quantity is 8000.

The IPO opens on November 30, 2023, and closes on December 4, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Net Avenue Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Net Avenue Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Net Avenue Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Net Avenue Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Net Avenue Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Net Avenue Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Net Avenue Technologies IPO opens on November 30, 2023 and closes on December 4, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Net Avenue Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Net Avenue Technologies IPO lot size is 8000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Net Avenue Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Net Avenue Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Net Avenue Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Net Avenue Technologies IPO will be done on Thursday, December 7, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, December 11, 2023. Check the Net Avenue Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Net Avenue Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Net Avenue Technologies IPO listing date is on Friday, December 8, 2023.
